plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Business Card Pro to access your camera to scan cards.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Business Card Pro to access your photos to select cards.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow Business Card Pro to access your contacts to save business cards.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Business Card Pro to access your location to remember where you met this contact.

infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow Business Card Pro to access your calendar to create follow-up reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Allow Business Card Pro to access your reminders to create follow-up tasks.
